-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Conversions between Repa Arrays and ByteStrings.
--   
--   Conversions between Repa Arrays and ByteStrings.
@package repa-bytestring
@version 2.2.0.1


-- | Conversions between Repa Arrays and ByteStrings.
module Data.Array.Repa.ByteString

-- | Copy an <a>Array</a> to a (strict) <a>ByteString</a>.
toByteString :: Shape sh => Array sh Word8 -> ByteString

-- | Copy a (strict) <a>ByteString</a> to a new <a>Array</a>. The given
--   array extent must match the length of the <a>ByteString</a>, else
--   <a>error</a>.
fromByteString :: Shape sh => sh -> ByteString -> Array sh Word8

-- | Copy some data from somewhere into a new <a>Array</a>.
copyFromPtrWord8 :: Shape sh => sh -> Ptr Word8 -> IO (Array sh Word8)

-- | Copy array data somewhere.s
copyToPtrWord8 :: Shape sh => Ptr Word8 -> Array sh Word8 -> IO ()
